hotels.description: Escape your everyday and watch the world go by from your little slice of New Zealand paradise at Marina Cove Boutique Luxury Accommodation. Embrace the serenity from your private deck, complete with BBQ set-up, or head out to explore the spectacular landscapes - with white-sand beaches, picturesque coastal walkways, historic harbours and big-game fishing all within reach, youâ€™ll find plenty on your doorstep.
